title: Campus Diaries
overview: Campus Diaries is an MX Original series that will take you back in time to your college years. Given the past few difficult years, there are students who have not been able to enjoy the on-campus college life and the Campus Diaries web series can be a perfect binge watch for them. Directed by Prem Mistry, Campus Diaries is a college drama that narrates some common and some less explored experiences of students when they first step out of the comfort of their homes. From lifelong friendships to hard-learned lessons, college life earns a person many things and Campus Diaries explores this journey.
